# IP Lookup CLI

A **python CLI** for **looking up IP adresses** / **Domains**

# Installation

```bash
pip install git+https://github.com/eletrixtime/iplookup-cli
```

# Usage :)

```bash
iplookup <ip/domain>
```

# Providers

- ip-api.com

    - This is the default provider.


Under the MIT license.
